title: [Health] Computer model representing 98 million Americans' mobility in ten major U.S. cities during the pandemic pinpoints four high-risk "superspreader" sites: restaurants, gyms, hotels, and cafes. To slow Covid-19â€™s spread without full lockdown, the team recommends targeted occupancy caps in these places.

[Medicine] Bidirectional associations between COVID-19 and psychiatric disorder: retrospective cohort studies of 62 354 COVID-19 cases in the USA found that survivors of COVID-19 appear to be at increased risk of psychiatric sequelae, and a psychiatric diagnosis might be an independent risk factor for COVID-19
